dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.appli.BrokerCoordinationDetails
dataStructure.description:
This class implements the semantics of the BrokerCoordinates association, which defines which PolicyServers are coordinated by which PolicyBrokers. The semantics of this class will be more fully defined in the next version of the DEN-ng specification. This association defines the set of PolicyServers that this PolicyBroker coordinates the actions of.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: BrokerCoordinationDetails

child.name: brokerCoordinationTimePeriod
child.description:
This attribute defines the start and end times (in the form of time stamps) in which this PolicyBroker has the authority to coordinate the actions of this PolicyServer.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: brokerCoordinationTimePeriod

child.name: brokerCommMethod
child.description:
This is an enumerated integer that defines the communication method used between the PolicyBroker and the PolicyServers that it coordinates the actions of. Values include: 0: Not yet established 1: Telnet 2: COPS 3: Proprietary Protocol

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: brokerCommMethod
